title: Magic?!
body:
The spirit is trying to teach me magic now! If only I could just punch it in the face! It said something about killing a witch and going to a village.. I have no idea.
    Well, I guess I'll be on the lookout for a village as I explore about. Back to magic. MAGIC!?! Magic doesn't exist. Well, that one time.. that wave that crashed over me, sucked me into the ocean instantly.
    That's probably just my luck though. I guess I'll just learn magic.
